translated: Hello, welcome do you want to learn more about the services of.

It's an immense pleasure for me to teach you everything I know. My name is Raphael and when I work at Amazon Web Services, creating trainings like the one you're watching here, we hope you're enjoying this learning journey using the artificial intelligence services that the Amazon cloud offers.

Did you know that Amazon offers services to help you with computer vision, defect detection on assembly lines, data recognition in text and spoken content, business metrics in the health sector, improvement of source code, and even artificial intelligence in the industrial sector.
All of this to improve the experience of your customers.
